actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for increases in appropriation ceilings in certain units of the National Park System.

summary.text: Provides for increases in appropriation ceilings in the following units of the National Park System; (1) Arches National Park, Utah ($125,000 to $275,000), (2) Capital Reef National Park, Utah ($423,000 to $2,173,000), (3) Mesa Verde National Park, Colorado ($125,000 to $193,233), (4) North Cascades National Park and Lake Chelan National Recreation Area, Washington ($3,500,000 to $4,500,000), and (5) Scotts Bluff National Monument, Nebraska ($15,000 to $145,000).

titles.title: A bill to provide for increases in appropriation ceilings in certain units of the National Park System.
